short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A search page with useful social links for your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gain quick access to web search and popular social networks with the New Tab Quick Search from Clicknova.

After installing the extension your 'New Tab' page will be replaced with a fast and convenient web search with quick links to the social networks you use regularly.
